Diocese Anglican nke Okigwe South bụ otu n'ime iri na abụọ n'ime mpaghara Anglican Province nke Owerri, nke bụ otu n"ime mpaghara iri na anọ n'ime Chọọchị Naịjirịa.
Ehiwere ya na Jenụwarị 8, 1994, site na Diocese nke Okigwe-Orlu dị ka Diocese 44 nke mba ahụ
Bishọp ahụ bụ Bennett Okoro. Diocese malitere na 10 Priest, 8 parishes, 48 church stations na 5 archdeaconries: ugbu a enwere 9 Archdeaconries Caleb Maduoma ghọrọ ya Bishop nke abụọ na 2004
Bishọp nke ugbu a bụ David Onuoha, onye a họpụtara na July 2020 ka ọ bụrụ Achịbishọp of Owerri. Diocese na okike nwere otu ụlọ akwụkwọ ozi ala ọzọ; ọ nwere ugbu a 6.
Àtụ:Provinces (with dioceses) in the Church of Nigeria
